an4.136:4.1: “Mendicants, these four people are found in the world.
an4.136:4.3: One person has not fulfilled ethics, samādhi, or wisdom.
an4.136:5.1: One person has fulfilled ethics, but not samādhi or wisdom.
an4.136:6.1: One person has fulfilled ethics and samādhi, but not wisdom.
an4.136:7.1: One person has fulfilled ethics, samādhi, and wisdom.
an4.136:7.2: These are the four people found in the world.”
